What This Means To Me

I was definitely happy to learn that another person became inspired through following my journey as a self-taught front-end developer. Maybe to someone else this might seem like a simple exchange of words, but to me itâ€™s what I live for â€” inspiring that is.

Mini-rant: Creating Live Genuine Project is in the top 3 most rewarding things Iâ€™ve ever done. Now, with this blog, I hope to spread visibility to the transgender community and connect with all our allies on a larger scale. I donâ€™t want to feel limited by any one thing (like t-shirts). With a blog, I can speak about things that matter â€” like work, finances and family. There are enough t-shirts in this world, we need more hearts.

So, if I can reach a person, whether it be locally or half a world away, and inspire them to reach for things they wouldnâ€™t have otherwise AND bring awareness to equality â€” well by my standards thatâ€™s a life well-lived.
